verses.plain: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.

tokens.t: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks,
thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.

verses.plain: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.

tokens.t: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.

verses.plain: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.

tokens.t: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.

verses.plain: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:

tokens.t: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:

verses.plain: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.

tokens.t: Lift not up your horn on high: speak

verses.plain: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.

tokens.t: neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.

verses.plain: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.

tokens.t: the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.

verses.plain: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.

tokens.t: For in the hand of the
a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring

verses.plain: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.

tokens.t: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.

verses.plain: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.

tokens.t: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off;
the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.

footnotes.text: receive…: or, take a set time
